Package com.intellij.codeInspection.ex

Class InspectionElementsMerger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.codeInspection.ex.InspectionElementsMerger
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AssignmentOrReturnOfFieldWithMutableTypeInspectionMerger, CallToSuspiciousStringMethodInspectionMerger, InspectionElementsMergerBase, Java8MapApiInspectionMerger, MalformedSetUpTearDownInspectionMerger, MethodDoesntCallSuperMethodInspectionMerger, MethodOverridesInaccessibleMethodMerger, MisspelledMethodNameInspectionMerger, ObjectEqualityInspectionMerger, RedundantThrowsInspectionMerger, SerializableClassInSecureContextMerger, SimplifiableConditionalExpressionInspectionMerger, ThrowableNeverThrownInspectionMerger, WaitNotifyNotInSynchronizedContextInspectionMerger

    public abstract class InspectionElementsMerger
extends java.lang.Object
    Merges multiple inspections settings getSourceToolNames() into another one getMergedToolName() InspectionElementsMergerBase to provide more fine control over xml

      • getMerger

        public static InspectionElementsMerger getMerger(java.lang.String shortName)

      • getMergedToolName

        public abstract java.lang.String getMergedToolName()
        Returns:
        shortName of the new merged inspection.

      • getSourceToolNames

        public abstract java.lang.String [] getSourceToolNames()
        Returns:
        the shortNames of the inspections whose settings needs to be merged. when one of toolNames doesn't present in the profile, default settings for that tool are expected, e.g. by default the result would be enabled with min severity WARNING

      • getSuppressIds

        public java.lang.String [] getSuppressIds()
        The ids to check for suppression. If this returns an empty string array, the result of getSourceToolNames() is used instead.
        Returns:
        the suppressIds of the merged inspections.

      • getMergedToolName

        public static java.lang.String getMergedToolName(java.lang.String id)
        Parameters:
        id - suppress id in code
        Returns:
        new merged tool name null if merger is not found
